approveAfterDays.description: The number of days after the release date of each patch matched by the rule the patch is marked as approved in the patch baseline.

approveUntilDate.description: The cutoff date for auto approval of released patches. Any patches released on or before this date are installed automatically. Date is formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`. Conflicts with `approve_after_days`

complianceLevel.description: The compliance level for patches approved by this rule.

enableNonSecurity.description: Boolean enabling the application of non-security updates.

patchFilters.description: The patch filter group that defines the criteria for the rule.
